demo.name: Meta-Agentic α-AGI Jobs Demo V7 — Meta-Singularity
demo.narrative:
The sovereign owner ignites the Meta-Singularity console. AGI Jobs v0 (v2)
orchestrates identify→learn→think→design→strategise→execute loops while
verifying CI health, antifragility buffers, unstoppable reserves, and
on-chain governance hooks. Non-technical owners simply press run.

params.description: Deploying autonomous alpha factories across finance, supply chains, biotech, energy, and policy.
params.title: Meta-Singularity Sovereign Alpha Acceleration
